title: LEGO® Batman™ 3: Beyond Gotham
notes: The game starts normally, but after select "new game" the screen goes black with only the sound playing, then crashes. Tested DX11 and DX9.

title: LEGO® Batman™ 3: Beyond Gotham
notes: The black screen pops up, but it loses focus immidiately, and it keeps doing that, the game content never appears.

title: LEGO® Batman™ 3: Beyond Gotham
notes: Boots until main screen, if I change the renderer to directx9 game works without any issues, if I keep it on directx11, it shows black screen on cutscenes and only plays sound, so "completely stable" counts only for dx9 version.
DX11 doesn't work at all. DX9 works, but with graphical frequent glitches distorting most of the screen.
title: LEGO® Batman™3: Beyond Gotham

notes: With DirectX 9 enabled, runs flawlessly. With DirectX 11, the videos don't work, but everything else seems to work fine.
title: LEGO® Batman™3: Beyond Gotham

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-36-generic, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes:
Game loads but cant start a game it crashes to black screen
You need to change game to use Direct X 9 instead of Direct X 11
When in game go to 
Play game > Options > Video Settings > Direct X and change to 9
Restart and everything works
title: LEGO® Batman™3: Beyond Gotham
